docs.text: Lua API Here you can find all dumped Lua API functions and their descriptions. If a function has unknown parameters (...), it means that the function has not been reverse-engineered yet. In that case, feel free to contribute to the project by finding out what it does, what parameters it takes and what it returns. Available packages debug io os table math coroutine
docs.title: Lua API

docs.text: Here you can find all dumped Lua API functions and their descriptions. If a function has unknown parameters (...), it means that the function has not been reverse-engineered yet. In that case, feel free to contribute to the project by finding out what it does, what parameters it takes and what it returns.

docs.title: Global Functions

docs.text: Returns true if the debug commands are enabled.
docs.title: CanExecuteDebugCommands()

docs.text: Clears the global heat value.
docs.title: ClearGlobalHeat()

docs.text: Returns the global instance of the CScriptCallbackSystem .
docs.title: CScriptCallbackSystem_GetInstance()

docs.text: Displays a custom UI message.
docs.title: DisplayCustomUIMsg(messageID, state, 0, entityID, type)

docs.text: Toggles god mode on or off.
docs.title: EnableGodMode(enabled)

docs.text: Enables or disables unlimited ammo.
docs.title: EnableUnlimitedAmmo(enabled)

docs.text: Extinguishes all fires in the world.
docs.title: ExtinguishAllFires(1)

docs.text: Returns the entity ID of the closest safe house to the player.
docs.title: GetClosestSafeHouse(playerID)

docs.text: Returns a table of entity IDs in the specified group.
docs.title: GetEntitiesInGroup(groupID)

docs.text: Returns the player id of the local player.
docs.title: GetLocalPlayerId()

docs.text: Returns the group ID of the friendly players. Use GetEntitiesInGroup to get a table of entity IDs.
docs.title: GetPlayerGroup()

docs.text: Returns true if the player is the local player.
docs.title: IsPlayerLocal(playerID)

docs.text: Returns whether the safehouse with the given entity ID is unlocked.
docs.title: IsSafeHouseUnlocked(entityID)

docs.text: Pauses the global heat system.
docs.title: PauseGlobalHeat(paused)

docs.text: Removes an entity or group of entities.
docs.title: RemoveEntityOrGroup(id)

docs.text: Sends a command event to an entity. The parameters are stored in a table.
docs.title: SendCommandEventToEntity(entityID, commands, parameters)

docs.text: Enables or disables the ability to perform a front takedown.
docs.title: SetAllowFrontTakedown(playerID, enabled)

docs.text: Changes the size of the moon.
docs.title: SetOverrideMoonSize(size)

docs.text: Sets the game's slow motion speed. The default value is 1.0.
docs.title: SetSlowMotion(number speed)

docs.text: Sets the game's time scale. This is the speed at which time passes in the game. A value of 1.0 is normal speed, 0.5 is half speed, 2.0 is double speed, etc.
docs.title: SetTimeScale(scale)

docs.text: Shows the world map for the specified player.
docs.title: ShowWorldMap(playerID)

docs.text: Spawn an entity from an archetype. Returns the ID of the spawned entity.
docs.title: SpawnEntityFromArchetype_Legacy(archeType, x, y, z, yaw, pitch, roll)

docs.text: Starts the world map tutorial for the specified player.
